function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Marginalized people being more physically visible and exposed in cities during the pandemic","Impact":"Marginalized individuals at higher risk of exposure to contagious diseases due to lack of resources and support","Mitigation":"Increase access to healthcare, shelter, and resources for marginalized individuals","Technologies":"","People":"Marginalized individuals in cities","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on media for information about the pandemic","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased information about COVID-19 leading to misunderstanding and misinformation","Mitigation":"Promote reliable sources of information, improve media literacy, and provide accurate public health guidance","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, fact-checking technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Media organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inequitable access to technology and education impacting ability to understand and share experiences during the pandemic","Impact":"Limited access to technological education and equipment leading to exclusion from sharing experiences and accessing resources","Mitigation":"Provide technology and education resources to marginalized communities, promote digital inclusion and accessibility","Technologies":"Digital literacy programs, technology access initiatives","People":"Marginalized communities","Owner":"Community organizations, government"}]}
